SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE, (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(AVG(REVIEW_STARS), 'FM9.09'), '0.0') FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS REVIEW_STARS,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS WISH_OR_NOT
NULL
FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATE = 'N' ORDER BY P.CREATE_DT DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 16

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, G.SUPER_GUIDE_FL, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE, (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(AVG(REVIEW_STARS), 'FM9.09'), '0.0') FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS REVIEW_STARS,

NULL

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE, (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(AVG(REVIEW_STARS), 'FM9.09'), '0.0') FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS REVIEW_STARS FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATE = 'N' AND THEME_CODE = #{themeCode} ORDER BY P.CREATE_DT DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE, (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(AVG(REVIEW_STARS), 'FM9.09'), '0.0') FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS REVIEW_STARS,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS WISH_OR_NOT
NULL
FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TOUR_COURSE C ON P.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_DT D ON P.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATE = 'N'
AND (P.REGION_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' OR C.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' OR P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%${location}%')
AND D.PRODUCT_DT >= TO_DATE('${firstday}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND D.PRODUCT_DT <= TO_DATE('${lastday}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND '${tourist}' BETWEEN P.PRODUCT_MIN_TOURIST AND P.PRODUCT_MAX_TOURIST
GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE

SELECT DISTINCT column_alias, PRIORITY FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN C.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' THEN TRIM(C.COURSE_NAME) ELSE TRIM(P.REGION_NAME) END AS column_alias, CASE WHEN C.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS priority FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TOUR_COURSE C ON P.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATE = 'N' AND (P.REGION_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' OR C.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${location}%') ) ORDER BY PRIORITY

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE, (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(AVG(REVIEW_STARS), 'FM9.09'), '0.0') FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) AS REVIEW_STARS FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TOUR_COURSE C ON P.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_DT D ON P.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATE = 'N'
AND (P.REGION_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' OR C.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${location}%' OR P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%${location}%')
AND D.PRODUCT_DT >= TO_DATE('${firstday}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND D.PRODUCT_DT <= TO_DATE('${lastday}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND '${tourist}' BETWEEN P.PRODUCT_MIN_TOURIST AND P.PRODUCT_MAX_TOURIST
AND P.THEME_CODE = #{themeCode} GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.REGION_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PACKAGE

SELECT NVL("EVENT".EVENT_NO, 0) AS EVENT_NO, DUMMY_MAIN_BANNER_ORDER AS MAIN_BANNER_ORDER, NVL2(BG_COLOR, BG_COLOR, '#ffffff') AS BG_COLOR, FILE_PATH
FROM ( SELECT LEVEL AS DUMMY_MAIN_BANNER_ORDER FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 8 ) DUMMY_SEQ
LEFT JOIN "EVENT" ON DUMMY_MAIN_BANNER_ORDER = MAIN_BANNER_ORDER LEFT JOIN "FILE" ON "EVENT".EVENT_NO = "FILE".EVENT_NO AND FILE_ORDER = 0 ORDER BY MAIN_BANNER_ORDER
